title: Overwatch 2 Tier List
description: Discover the top heroes in Overwatch 2 as of December 2024. Explore our comprehensive tier list to enhance your gameplay and climb the ranks.
heading: Overwatch 2 Tier List
introText: Discover the top heroes in Overwatch 2 as of December 2024. Explore our comprehensive tier list to enhance your gameplay and climb the ranks.
